Welcome to cfDNA’s documentation!¶

cfdna – Library for analysis of cell-free DNA fragments¶

The Python-based implementation efficiently deals with many fragments.

cfDNA provides a scalable way to store and search overlapping intervals

See the code and discuss development on GitHub.
